column3:
“Evidently I am sensitive to cannabinoids as I experience highs on and off for 3 days after use of any strain.

I grind then vaporize.

This strain made me tired and seems best for insomnia.”

“This is some good shit. Ian was telling me about it, I looked it up on here and knew I needed this! I was right! It's awesome. I love how focused and creative it makes me. It's legit and I love it <3”
“Smooth  and tastes a little like flowers and cheese oddly.”
“Not to be smoked if you have things to do. Great for night time smoking, but you'll be horribly ineffective and inefficient if you smoke this during the day time.”

“this stuff was so amazingly good i cant wait to get some more... On my way to G.O.E, good for major relaxation and high stress. amazing for pain helps you to forget about it!!!!!!!
 ahhhh...
HEAVENLY.....”

“The smells are true, flowery and citrus, smells great, definitely does have balanced effects. This is definitely a good  strain in my book. I like the indica effects to it and the cerebral sati a side was just the right amount. I had no problems with this strain. I would use this during the day or evening, depending if you want to chill or eat then sleep.”
“This bud will take from anorexia to starring on My 600 Pound Life. I suggest smoking just before a HUGE meal. You'll want the food, ALL the food. Do not smoke if you're trying to lose weight.”
“This strain knocked me the fuck out in 2 hours. Black velvet is nothing to underestimate especially if it comes out of a dispensary. It is a very powerful strain”
“if you're looking for an indica dominant strain that will slow you down and zap your energy this is for you. not recommended for daytime smoking, especially if you have things to do.”
“Not that flavourful,but very good feeling and smooth,For happy times :)”
“This bud will take from anorexia to starring on My 600 Pound Life. I suggest smoking just before a HUGE meal. You'll want the food, ALL the food. Do not smoke if you're trying to lose weight.”
“If you wanna sleep then use this strain”
“This strain knocked me the fuck out in 2 hours. Black velvet is nothing to underestimate especially if it comes out of a dispensary. It is a very powerful strain”

“The smells are true, flowery and citrus, smells great, definitely does have balanced effects. This is definitely a good  strain in my book. I like the indica effects to it and the cerebral sati a side was just the right amount. I had no problems with this strain. I would use this during the day or evening, depending if you want to chill or eat then sleep.”
“Smoked this as a pure blunt very taste, got proper stoned and watched Pokemon 2000”
“I had this about 3 times now, it's a pretty decent hybrid strain.”
“Really nice strain.. ill be getting more 4sure!”
“I had an amazing time. I was more than happy, i felt like i could conquer the world! This is something you wouldn't want to pass up.”

“Maui Waui is one of my favorite strains ever.

Fat, greasy, tropical-dank smelling, nugs from heaven that break down nicely are the typical.

The high...unparalleled for my money's worth. Just the tip of the iceberg: I sat on a bus, and saw the world passing through the windows like a slideshow-amusement park type thing (or a rocketship) after a few seconds of a milky hit.”
